item.title: MobiLogLeak: A Preliminary Study on Data Leakage Caused by Poor Logging Practices
item.description: This work was done with my supervisor Wahab Hamou-Lhadj in collaboration with Dr. Mohammad Hamdaqa and Dr. Haipeng Cai. Presented by Rui Zhou on Feb. 21, 2020, in London, ON, Canada.
